actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the Federal Communications Commission to repromulgate certain regulations prohibiting trafficking in station licenses except when ownership is sought by minorities.
subjects: Minorities in the mass media industry

summary.text: Broadcast Ownership Stability Act of 1987 - Requires the Federal Communications Commission to repromulgate its rules requiring a broadcast license to be held for three years before any transfer, with an exception for transfers to members of minority groups.

titles.title: A bill to require the Federal Communications Commission to repromulgate certain regulations prohibiting trafficking in station licenses except when ownership is sought by minorities.
